[line]

[size=4]Kynes Peace[/size]
[size=3]Now Kynes Peace affects spriggans[/size]

[size=4]Storm Call[/size]
[size=3]Here is the changes
Originally, the storm hit everyone, friend, hostile, or neutral, and struck random spots
Now, the storm [b]only targets NPCs when they are hostile to you.[/b]
Originally, the storm was stationary and only targets people who were nearby when the shout started
Now, the storm follows you, and targets any hostile who enters range
Originally, only those who were near you when you first shouted can be targeted
Now, the storm uses a script that dynamically searches for valid targets.
Now, the storm itself is not considered a hostile attack
This means that you [b]won't automatically get a bounty from shouting
[/b] Also, on the ~0.001% chance that neutral/friendly NPCs get hit (example: the bolt misses or they somehow walk into it), they won't automatically attack you, because they [b]shouldn't blame you for being struck by lightning[/b]
For each new word, the area affected by the shout is 3-6 larger than the vanilla version
Lightning bolts travel faster, further, and deal a powerful stagger effect upon impact
The damage of lightning bolts vary randomly, depending on the strength of the storm
A number of bugs from Bethesda's original Storm Call effect script have been fixed[/size]

[size=4]Aura Whisper[/size]
[size=3]Changes aura whisper effects depending on what life forms are present
Not only can you now distinguish between enemies and allies, now you can distinguish between types of life forms as well
To name a few: generic enemies are red, allies are blue, enemy undeads are orange, allied undeads are light blue[/size]

[size=3]Additionally, the range of the aura whisper shout has been changed
Vanilla had a range of 500 in exteriors and 300 in interiors; now, the range is constant at 400 regardless of where you are
The duration is the same as vanilla (10/20/30 seconds depending on words used)[/size]

[size=4]No Guard Warnings[/size]
[size=3]Now guards won't warn you when using shouts like Throw Voice[/size]
